00011 // volumegrid.cpp*
00012 #include "volume.h"
00013 // VolumeGrid Declarations
00014 class VolumeGrid : public DensityRegion {
00015 public:
00016         // VolumeGrid Public Methods
00017         VolumeGrid(const Spectrum &sa, const Spectrum &ss, float gg,
00018                         const Spectrum &emit, const BBox &e, const Transform &v2w,
00019                         int nx, int ny, int nz, const float *d);
00020         ~VolumeGrid() { delete[] density; }
00021         BBox WorldBound() const { return WorldToVolume.GetInverse()(extent); }
00022         bool IntersectP(const Ray &r, float *t0, float *t1) const {
00023                 Ray ray = WorldToVolume(r);
00024                 return extent.IntersectP(ray, t0, t1);
00025         }
00026         float Density(const Point &Pobj) const;
00027         float D(int x, int y, int z) const {
00028                 x = Clamp(x, 0, nx-1);
00029                 y = Clamp(y, 0, ny-1);
00030                 z = Clamp(z, 0, nz-1);
00031                 return density[z*nx*ny + y*nx + x];
00032         }
00033 private:
00034         // VolumeGrid Private Data
00035         float *density;
00036         const int nx, ny, nz;
00037         const BBox extent;
00038 };
00039 // VolumeGrid Method Definitions
00040 VolumeGrid::VolumeGrid(const Spectrum &sa,
00041                 const Spectrum &ss, float gg,
00042                 const Spectrum &emit, const BBox &e,
00043                 const Transform &v2w,
00044                 int x, int y, int z, const float *d)
00045         : DensityRegion(sa, ss, gg, emit, v2w),
00046         nx(x), ny(y), nz(z), extent(e) {
00047         density = new float[nx*ny*nz];
00048         memcpy(density, d, nx*ny*nz*sizeof(float));
00049 }
00050 float VolumeGrid::Density(const Point &Pobj) const {
00051         if (!extent.Inside(Pobj)) return 0;
00052         // Compute voxel coordinates and offsets for _Pobj_
00053         float voxx = (Pobj.x - extent.pMin.x) /
00054                 (extent.pMax.x - extent.pMin.x) * nx - .5f;
00055         float voxy = (Pobj.y - extent.pMin.y) /
00056                 (extent.pMax.y - extent.pMin.y) * ny - .5f;
00057         float voxz = (Pobj.z - extent.pMin.z) /
00058                 (extent.pMax.z - extent.pMin.z) * nz - .5f;
00059         int vx = Floor2Int(voxx);
00060         int vy = Floor2Int(voxy);
00061         int vz = Floor2Int(voxz);
00062         float dx = voxx - vx, dy = voxy - vy, dz = voxz - vz;
00063         // Trilinearly interpolate density values to compute local density
00064         float d00 = Lerp(dx, D(vx, vy, vz),     D(vx+1, vy, vz));
00065         float d10 = Lerp(dx, D(vx, vy+1, vz),  D(vx+1, vy+1, vz));
00066         float d01 = Lerp(dx, D(vx, vy, vz+1),  D(vx+1, vy, vz+1));
00067         float d11 = Lerp(dx, D(vx, vy+1, vz+1),D(vx+1, vy+1, vz+1));
00068         float d0 = Lerp(dy, d00, d10);
00069         float d1 = Lerp(dy, d01, d11);
00070         return Lerp(dz, d0, d1);
00071 }
00072 extern "C" DLLEXPORT VolumeRegion *CreateVolumeRegion(const Transform &volume2world,
00073                 const ParamSet &params) {
00074         // Initialize common volume region parameters
00075         Spectrum sigma_a = params.FindOneSpectrum("sigma_a", 0.);
00076         Spectrum sigma_s = params.FindOneSpectrum("sigma_s", 0.);
00077         float g = params.FindOneFloat("g", 0.);
00078         Spectrum Le = params.FindOneSpectrum("Le", 0.);
00079         Point p0 = params.FindOnePoint("p0", Point(0,0,0));
00080         Point p1 = params.FindOnePoint("p1", Point(1,1,1));
00081         int nitems;
00082         const float *data = params.FindFloat("density", &nitems);
00083         if (!data) {
00084                 Error("No \"density\" values provided for volume grid?");
00085                 return NULL;
00086         }
00087         int nx = params.FindOneInt("nx", 1);
00088         int ny = params.FindOneInt("ny", 1);
00089         int nz = params.FindOneInt("nz", 1);
00090         if (nitems != nx*ny*nz) {
00091                 Error("VolumeGrid has %d density values but nx*ny*nz = %d",
00092                         nitems, nx*ny*nz);
00093                 return NULL;
00094         }
00095         return new VolumeGrid(sigma_a, sigma_s, g, Le, BBox(p0, p1),
00096                 volume2world, nx, ny, nz, data);
00097 }
